author: JuliaRegistrator

comments.body:
Hello, I am an automated registration bot. I help manage the registration process by checking your registration against a set of [AutoMerge guidelines](https://juliaregistries.github.io/RegistryCI.jl/stable/guidelines/). If all these guidelines are met, this pull request will be merged automatically, completing your registration. It is **strongly recommended** to follow the guidelines, since otherwise the pull request needs to be manually reviewed and merged by a human.

## 1. New package registration

Please make sure that you have read the [package naming guidelines](https://julialang.github.io/Pkg.jl/dev/creating-packages/#Package-naming-guidelines-1).

## 2. [AutoMerge Guidelines](https://juliaregistries.github.io/RegistryCI.jl/stable/guidelines/) are all met! ✅

Your new package registration met all of the guidelines for auto-merging and is scheduled to be merged when the mandatory waiting period (3 days) has elapsed.

## 3. To pause or stop registration

If you want to prevent this pull request from being auto-merged, simply leave a comment. If you want to post a comment without blocking auto-merging, you must include the text `[noblock]` in your comment. 

_Tip: You can edit blocking comments to add `[noblock]` in order to unblock auto-merging._

<!-- [noblock] -->
<!---
this_is_the_single_automerge_comment
--->
Hi, congrats on the package! The name however is a bit short and possibly confusing. I know it's a long and tedious process but would you wanna try and contribute these to Distributions instead?
@gdalle Thank you so much for the congratulation. You mean including this set of distributions in `Distributions.jl`?

I would like to, but I'm not sure what it takes to contribute to such a
large package.

El jue, 1 ago 2024 a la(s) 9:16 a.m., Guillaume Dalle (
***@***.***) escribió:

> Exactly
>
> —
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/112190#issuecomment-2263193692>,
> or unsubscribe
> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/A7PTWNVFNDZTALUMG6VVLCLZPI7LDAVCNFSM6AAAAABLZYKYM6VHI2DSMVQWIX3LMV43OSLTON2WKQ3PNVWWK3TUHMZDENRTGE4TGNRZGI>
> .
> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.Message ID:
> ***@***.***>
>
Maybe you can get in touch with @devmotion about contributing to Distributions

Thanks, I'll do that. I will contact him, I hope the work is of interest to
him.

El jue, 1 ago 2024 a la(s) 9:46 a.m., Michael Goerz (
***@***.***) escribió:

> Maybe you can get in touch with @devmotion <https://github.com/devmotion>
> about contributing to Distributions
>
> —
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/112190#issuecomment-2263263138>,
> or unsubscribe
> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/A7PTWNTRVLBCDBZWOKIOKFLZPJC53AVCNFSM6AAAAABLZYKYM6VHI2DSMVQWIX3LMV43OSLTON2WKQ3PNVWWK3TUHMZDENRTGI3DGMJTHA>
> .
> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.Message ID:
> ***@***.***>
>
@devmotion Hello, I hope you are well, do you think we can include this in `Distributions.jl`?

Close this PR and link to https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/pull/112309 

The name change was made
